DataElement.preferredName: Local Clinical Study Yes or No Response Multi-Institutional Clinical Trial java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.:Clinical trial conducted according to a single protocol but at more than one site, and, therefore, carried out by more than one investigator. [ICH E9 Glossary]_Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Local Clinical Study Yes or No Response Multi-Institutional Clinical Trial
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.:Clinical trial conducted according to a single protocol but at more than one site, and, therefore, carried out by more than one investigator. [ICH E9 Glossary]

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

Concepts.definition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.

Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

Property.preferredName: Yes or No Response Multi-Institutional Clinical Trial
Property.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.:Clinical trial conducted according to a single protocol but at more than one site, and, therefore, carried out by more than one investigator. [ICH E9 Glossary]

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
Clinical trial conducted according to a single protocol but at more than one site and, therefore, carried out by more than one investigator.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/9/12 - Released as part of caAERS v2.0 model cleanup.  jc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
